name: Infite Kart
description:
Press Full Screen or Download the .zip to fix the weird resolution

Infinite Kart is a kart racing game with a retro style. However, you're stuck in a loop, no matter how many laps you complete you never reach the finish line.

The way to escape? Use the ammo and mystery boxes throughout the levels to defeat your opponents.

Controls

WASD - Kart controls

Left Shift - Drift

Enter - Shoot basic weapon

Space - Use Mystery Item

Note from Chicken Leg Studios

This game is not fully polished, and may be a bit  messy, but we hope you have fun playing it, because we had fun making it!
